lead_paragraph: The city’s retaking has been hailed, but its destruction bears testament to the cost of dislodging a group that stitches itself into the fabric of the communities it seizes.
snippet: The city’s retaking has been hailed, but its destruction bears testament to the cost of dislodging a group that stitches itself into the fabric of the communities it seizes.

headline.main: Ramadi, Reclaimed by Iraq, Is in Ruins After ISIS Fight
headline.print_headline: Devastation in Ramadi Shows Cost of ISIS Fight

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

abstract: Extensive destruction of Iraqi city of Ramadi, reclaimed from Islamic State by country's security's forces, lays bare huge costs of fighting extremist group and removing it from besieged urban areas; United States-led coalition's successes have left communities in ruins, with few resources to rebuild.
